com.mygdx.game.assets

Class WalkingTextures

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.assets.WalkingTextures

  • public final class WalkingTextures
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a standard set of textures for character facing and walking animation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[] idleTextures
      Textures to use when the character isn't moving.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation[] walkingAnimations
      Animations to use when the character is walking.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WalkingTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion all)
      Initialises this TextureSet with a single texture used for everything.
      WalkingTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion down, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion up, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion left, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion right)
      Initialises this TextureSet with textures for facing.
      WalkingTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion down, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion up, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion left, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion right, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingDown, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingUp, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingLeft, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingRight)
      Initialises this TextureSet with textures for facing and movement animations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WalkingTextures

        public WalkingTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion all)
        Initialises this TextureSet with a single texture used for everything.
        Parameters:
        all - the texture to use for everything

      • WalkingTextures

        public WalkingTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion down,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion up,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion left,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion right)
        Initialises this TextureSet with textures for facing. No movement animations will be used.
        Parameters:
        down - the forward facing texture
        up - the backward facing texture
        left - the left facing texture
        right - the right facing texture

      • WalkingTextures

        public WalkingTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion down,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion up,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion left,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion right,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingDown,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingUp,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingLeft,
                       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation walkingRight)
        Initialises this TextureSet with textures for facing and movement animations.
        Parameters:
        down - the forward facing texture
        up - the backward facing texture
        left - the left facing texture
        right - the right facing texture
        walkingDown - the walking forward animation
        walkingUp - the walking backward animation
        walkingLeft - the walking left animation
        walkingRight - the walking right animation

    • Method Detail

      • getTexture

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getTexture(Character.Direction facing,
                                                              float stateTime)
        Gets the texture for the specified facing at the specified state time. A state time of 0 means not moving; idle.
        Parameters:
        facing - the facing
        stateTime - the state time
        Returns:
        the appropriate texture
